code: export const formatDate=dateString=>{const options={year:"numeric",month:"long",day:"numeric"};const date=new Date(dateString);const formattedDate=date.toLocaleDateString("en-US",options);const hour=date.getHours();const minutes=date.getMinutes();const period=hour>=12?"PM":"AM";const formattedTime="".concat(hour%12,":").concat(minutes.toString().padStart(2,"0")," ").concat(period);return"".concat(formattedDate," | ").concat(formattedTime);};
